entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:52 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
